definition[0]: to move by jumping on one foot
example[0]: a little girl hopping and skipping
definition[1]: if a bird, an insect, or a small animal hops, it moves by making quick short jumps
definition[2]: to move somewhere quickly or suddenly
example[1]: Hop in – I’ll drive you home.
example[2]: Patrick hopped out of bed and quickly got dressed.
definition[4]: parts of dried flowers used for making beer, which give the beer a bitter taste
definition[5]: the tall plant on which these flowers grow
definition[6]: a single short journey by plane
example[3]: It’s just a short hop from Cleveland to Detroit.
definition[7]: a social event at which people dance
